se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authentication

Packages that use se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authentication
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.attributes.nameid
Support for SAML NameIDs.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.attributes.release
Support for attribute release.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.audit.data
Audit data definitions.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authentication
Support for user authentication including SSO.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authentication.provider
Authentication provider support.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.authentication.provider.external
Support for "external user authentication", i.e., when we redirect the user outside of the Spring Security flow to get authenticated.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.config.configurers
Configurers for the SAML Identity Provider.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.demo.authn
Classes for implementing user authentication (simulated).
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.events
Event handling.
se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.web.filters
Filters for the SAML Identity Provider.

    Class
    Description
    PostAuthenticationProcessor
    After the user authentication a Saml2UserAuthentication token is received.

    A utility class that holds information about a SAML Service Provider that the IdP may want to use in its UI.
    Saml2ServiceProviderUiInfo.Logotype
    Representation of a logotype.
    Saml2UserAuthentication
    An Authentication token that represents the authentication of a user.
    Saml2UserAuthentication.AuthenticationInfoTrack
    Remembers all (SAML) occurences where the user authentication has been used.
    Saml2UserAuthentication.AuthenticationInfoTrack.AuthnUse
    Record recording the usage time and requesting SP for an authentication.
    Saml2UserDetails
    Representation of a user authenticated using SAML2.
